  • John Brown
    Rembrandt started as a teacher of P. rastman in his early years, and opened a studio in his hometown in 1625. There are a wide range of painting styles. He is good at portrait painting, landscape painting, custom painting, religious painting, historical painting and other fields.
    France Paris
    1958/
    Now living in Beijing
